Question: On June 14, 1952, this person signed with Braves' scout Dewey Griggs.
Hints: In addition, this person hit for a .336 batting average.
This person also knocked in the 2,000th run of his career and hit a home run in the first All-Star game played in Atlanta.
As the year came to a close, this person broke Stan Musial's major league record for total bases (6,134).
